query: What Dell desktop models are mentioned in this document?
forbidden_contains: I don't know from the provided documents.
golden_answer:
The brochure enumerates the Dell Pro desktop portfolio alongside OptiPlex systems designed for different business needs.[1][2][4][5][6][8]

These models include:

- OptiPlex Micro
- OptiPlex Micro Plus
- OptiPlex Tower
- OptiPlex SFF
- OptiPlex SFF Plus
- Dell Pro Micro
- Dell Pro Micro Plus
- Dell Pro Tower
- Dell Pro Slim
- Dell Pro Slim Plus
- Dell Pro 24 All-in-One 35W
- Dell Pro 24 All-in-One 65W
- Dell Pro 24 All-in-One Plus

Collectively these desktops balance compact footprints, expandability, and collaboration features to support modern workplaces.[1][2][4][5][6][8]

Sources: [1][2][4][5][6][8]

query: How do these Dell Pro desktops compare to typical business PCs?
expected_contains: AI PC options powered by Intel® Core™ Ultra
forbidden_contains: I don't know from the provided documents.
golden_answer:
Dell Pro desktops emphasise business productivity by combining AI PC options powered by Intel® Core™ Ultra and AMD Ryzen™ processors with MIL-STD durability testing.[1][3][4]

They offer configurations such as Dell Pro Slim and Dell Pro Tower that balance serviceability, expansion, and manageability better than generic business desktops.[3][4]

World notes

- Typical business desktops prioritise predictable lifecycle support and remote manageability, while Dell Pro systems extend those capabilities with advanced expansion and AI acceleration.(model prior)
- Sustainability and energy-efficiency expectations increasingly shape desktop refresh decisions, making Dell Pro's recycled materials and efficient footprints stand out.(model prior)

Sources: [1][3][4][8]
